What is the key difference between the STSG approach and the tecto-empty machine translation system that contributed to the latter's success?
Why did the STSG approach fail in the context of the tectogrammatic layer application, and what was one of the interesting components of the more successful tecto-empty machine translation system?

**Answer:**  
One of the interesting components of the tecto-empty machine translation system is the hidden Markov 3 model.
